body_html: You have a max of 4096 shared memory segments allowed, maybe that's an issue. You can try increasing that by writing to /proc/sys/kernel/shmmni (maybe try 8192). You may need superuser privileges.
body_text: You have a max of 4096 shared memory segments allowed, maybe that's an issue. You can try increasing that by writing to /proc/sys/kernel/shmmni (maybe try 8192). You may need superuser privileges.
body: You have a max of 4096 shared memory segments allowed, maybe that's an issue. You can try increasing that by writing to `/proc/sys/kernel/shmmni` (maybe try 8192). You may need superuser privileges.
